author: julianfoad
msg: Fix issue 1692: obscure bugs in formatting of time/date strings.
Fix the formatting of negative fractional-hour time offsets: an offset
of -75 minutes was written as "-01-15" instead of the correct "-0115".
Ensure that the string is terminated even if the human-readable part

author: julianfoad
msg: Make parameter names match the prototype.

author: julianfoad
msg: Clarify, in HACKING, which standard string functions are acceptable.

author: mbk
msg: It Came From The Planet Of The Bens!
This patch provided by Ben Gollmer, reviewed with minor fixes from
Ben Reser, and finally tweaked and committed by M. Ben(edetto) King.
(blame_receiver): Also output the date if the verbose option is set.
(svn_cl__blame): Populate and pass a blame_baton_t to svn_client_blame().
(svn_cl__cmd_table): Add a verbose option to blame.
